stimulusHtml: What is the value of  choice  after executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment. 

 

int temp = 75;
String choice;
boolean hasSibling = false;

if (temp < 70) 
{
   choice = "Indoors"; 
}
else 
{ 
   choice = "Outdoors"; 
}
if (hasSibling)
{
   choice += " with sibling";
}
